tasks.label: Setup Python Data Analysis Environment
tasks.command: cd project-templates/python-data-analysis && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
tasks.detail: Create virtual environment and install Python dependencies for data analysis project

tasks.label: Start Jupyter for Data Analysis
tasks.command: cd project-templates/python-data-analysis && source venv/bin/activate && jupyter notebook copilot-data-analysis-starter.ipynb
tasks.detail: Launch Jupyter notebook for GitHub Copilot data analysis practice

tasks.label: Generate Sample Data
tasks.command: cd project-templates/python-data-analysis && source venv/bin/activate && cd sample-data && python generate_sample_data.py
tasks.detail: Generate sample datasets for Python data analysis practice

tasks.label: Setup React Todo App
tasks.detail: Install dependencies for React Todo App template

tasks.label: Setup Node.js API
tasks.detail: Install dependencies for Node.js API template

tasks.label: Start Node.js API Dev Server
tasks.detail: Start Node.js development server with hot reload
